            <string language="en">pyridin</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A piridin szerkezetét bemutató ábra</string>
            <string language="en">pyridin</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">nitrogéntartalmú szerves vegyületek,  nitrogéntartalmú heteroaromás vegyületek,  </string>
            <string language="en"> organic substances containing nitrogen,  heteroaromatic substances containing nitrogen  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pyridin</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pyridin</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">organische Substanzen, die Stickstoff, heteroaromatic 
Substanzen enthalten Stickstoff enthalten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">substances organiques contenant l'azote, substances 
heteroaromatic contenant l'azote</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">substâncias orgânicas que contêm o nitrogênio, 
substâncias heteroaromatic que contêm o nitrogênio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sostanze organiche che contengono azoto, sostanze 
heteroaromatic che contengono azoto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οργανικές ουσίες που περιέχουν το άζωτο, heteroaromatic 
ουσίες που περιέχει το άζωτο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sustancias orgánicas que contienen el nitrógeno, 
sustancias heteroaromatic que contienen el nitrógeno</string>
          </keyword>
